column4: Because old msdos partition can only accept 3 Primary + 1 Extended + unlimit Logic Partition OR 4 Primary Partitions
where can I upload my pics so I can ask question?
Any free link to upload my pics?
Choose a plugin for media type application /x-shockwave-flash : there are 3 options, which should I choose?
1 .Adobe Flash Player (Installer) 2. Swfdec SWF player 3. Gnash SWF Player
do you care about not using proprietary, closed source software?
what do you mean? What if I choose proprietary, what will happen?
adobe's flash player is proprietary and closed source.  That means only adobe can develop it and fix bugs
no, I'd suggest you choose 1) unless you care about that
2) and 3) won't be able to play all flash as well as 1) does, but 2) and 3) are free software in the sense that anyone can grab the source and edit it.  That's why they exist
most support channels (including this one) prefer that you discuss only support issues
ubttu iceroot bibekp......... so..... imagemagick, a command in terminal?
